channel.title: Hello! on Cup O Tea
channel.description: Recent content in Hello! on Cup O Tea

item.title: Secret Cave: Rocky Peak
item.description: Location Start: 34.2684, -118.6362 End: 34.2811, -118.6475 Rocky Peak Trailhead Take exit 32 (Rocky Peak Road) on the Ronald Reagan Freeway (CA-118) Take a left and park in the parking space. There are limited amount of spaces, so if the parking lot is filled up, then take a right and park in that space. Comments The cave is smaller than I thought it would be. Once you arrive, you need to go downwards and use the wires on the rock to lower yourself.

item.title: Homemade Bagels
item.description: Directions Bagels Bloom your yeast first. Get 297 grams of water at about 100 degrees F and add 10 grams of yeast (~ 1 tablespoon) and 23 grams of sugar (~1.5 tablespoon). Give a stir to immerse yeast in water. Let it rest for 10 minutes. The yeast will puff up. Stir again. Add 500g (~3.5 cups) bread flour, 6g salt (~1.5 teaspoons)and the yeast to a bowl. Turn dough out onto work surface and knead the dough for ~10 minutes.

item.title: Hello 2022!
item.description: Happy New Year! I hope everyone has a blessed year. Your browser does not support the video tag.
